page.title: 07Tourism
page.content: Hartington is a popular tourist area attracting many people because there are so many interesting places to go to and many beautiful walks. Because of this Hartington has plenty of gift shops and guest houses. There are excellent public houses. Many coaches stop here to let the tourist visit the gift shops and buy ce creams and refreshments. People we interviewed said that they liked Hartington. It was so pretty. They visited the cheese shop to buy Stilton. One of our finest old houses, Hartington Hall, is now the youth hostel visited by hundreds of people throughout the year. Although more people visit the village in the summer and spring, we still get many visitors in autumn and winter.
